vehicles.name: Vehicles
vehicles.description: Machines built for speed and survival

products.name: Neural Interface v3.2
products.description: Direct brain-computer interface. Jack into cyberspace. WARNING: May cause digital addiction and existential dread.

products.name: Mantis Blades
products.description: Retractable carbon-fiber forearm blades. Slice through corporate lies and enemy flesh with equal ease.

products.name: Cybernetic Eyes
products.description: Enhanced optical implants with night vision, zoom, and target analysis. See the matrix for what it really is.

products.name: Subdermal Armor
products.description: Titanium-weave implants under your skin. Turn your body into a walking fortress. Bullets become suggestions.

products.name: Adrenal Boosters
products.description: Combat stimulant dispensers in your bloodstream. React faster than humanly possible when death comes calling.

products.name: Cyber Legs v2.5
products.description: Military-grade leg replacements. Jump 20 feet high, run 60 mph. Leave your human limitations in the dust.

products.name: Memory Palace
products.description: Expanded storage capacity for your brain. Never forget a face, password, or grudge ever again.

products.name: Thermal Regulators
products.description: Internal climate control systems. Survive arctic cold or desert heat. Weather is just another obstacle to overcome.

products.name: Cyber Heart
products.description: Titanium pump that never stops. Immunity to cardiac arrest, toxins, and emotional attachment.

products.name: Neural Firewall
products.description: Mental security system against netrunner attacks. Your thoughts remain your own in this connected world.

products.name: Smart Pistol
products.description: Auto-targeting sidearm with AI assistance. Thinks faster than you do, shoots faster than your enemies can hide.

products.name: Plasma Rifle
products.description: High-energy weapon that melts through armor like butter. Corporate security's worst nightmare.

products.name: Mono-molecular Katana
products.description: Traditional blade with a modern twist. Edge sharpened to molecular level cuts through anything.

products.name: Shock Baton
products.description: Non-lethal crowd control weapon. Delivers enough voltage to drop a cyberpsycho. Great for interrogations.

products.name: Gauss Rifle
products.description: Magnetic acceleration weapon. Silent, deadly, and leaves no ballistic evidence. The assassin's choice.

products.name: Cyber Whip
products.description: Electrified neural whip. Cuts through armor and disrupts enemy cyberware. Pain is the message.

products.name: Sonic Cannon
products.description: Sound-based area denial weapon. Shatter windows, bones, and enemy morale with targeted frequencies.

products.name: Smart Grenades
products.description: AI-guided explosives with target recognition. They know friend from foe better than you do.

products.name: Laser Carbine
products.description: Precision energy weapon with unlimited ammo. Solar-powered death ray for the environmentally conscious killer.

products.name: Quantum Destabilizer
products.description: Experimental weapon that phases targets out of reality. Some problems require impossible solutions.

products.name: ICE Breaker v2.0
products.description: Advanced hacking suite. Penetrate the most secure corporate networks. Leaves no digital footprints.

products.name: Ghost Protocol
products.description: Ultimate stealth program. Become invisible in both digital and physical realms. Used by the best netrunners.

products.name: Data Miner Pro
products.description: Extract valuable intel from any system. Turn information into power, power into eddies.

products.name: Virus Factory
products.description: Automated malware generator. Create custom digital plagues for any target. Spread chaos with a click.

products.name: Memory Wipe
products.description: Selective amnesia inducer. Make inconvenient witnesses forget they ever saw you. Clean exits guaranteed.

products.name: AI Assistant Alpha
products.description: Personal artificial intelligence companion. Handles mundane tasks while you focus on bigger schemes.

products.name: Corporate Backdoor
products.description: Pre-installed access to major corp systems. Someone on the inside left the door open for you.

products.name: Reality Simulator
products.description: Perfect virtual world generator. When real life gets too real, step into something better.

products.name: Signal Jammer
products.description: Digital interference package. Cut enemy communications and create electronic dead zones.

products.name: Quantum Encryptor
products.description: Unbreakable encryption using quantum entanglement. Your secrets stay secret until the heat death of the universe.

products.name: Holographic Display
products.description: Portable 3D interface projector. Make reality more interesting with augmented overlays.

products.name: Personal Drone
products.description: Autonomous surveillance and utility drone. Your eyes and hands where you can't be.

products.name: Neural Stimulator
products.description: Boost cognitive performance beyond human limits. Warning: Addiction potential high.

products.name: Stealth Cloak
products.description: Optical camouflage device. Bend light around your body. Become the shadow you were meant to be.

products.name: Portable Med Station
products.description: Emergency medical suite in a briefcase. Patch up bullet holes and broken bones on the go.

products.name: Quantum Communicator
products.description: Instantaneous communication across any distance. Some conversations can't wait for speed of light.

products.name: Gravity Boots
products.description: Walk on walls and ceilings. Physics is just another rule to break when you have the right equipment.

products.name: Scanner Goggles
products.description: Multi-spectrum analysis eyewear. See heat signatures, x-ray vision, and hidden electronic signatures.

products.name: Time Dilator
products.description: Personal temporal field generator. Slow down time around you when reflexes matter most.

products.name: Universal Translator
products.description: Real-time language conversion device. Break down communication barriers in the global underground.

products.name: Cyber Motorcycle
products.description: Street racing bike with neural control interface. Think it, and the bike responds. Speed is your religion.

products.name: Armored Sedan
products.description: Corporate executive transport with military-grade protection. Survive assassination attempts in style.

products.name: Hover Bike
products.description: Anti-gravity personal transport. Traffic jams are for people who can't afford to fly.

products.name: Stealth Jet
products.description: Personal aircraft invisible to radar. When you need to disappear into the sky without a trace.

products.name: Combat Exosuit
products.description: Walking tank for urban warfare. Turn yourself into a one-person army with integrated weapons systems.

products.name: Speed Demon Car
products.description: Nitro-powered street racer with AI driver assistance. Break every speed limit and law of physics.

products.name: Submarine Pod
products.description: Personal underwater vehicle. Explore flooded cities and escape through storm drains.

products.name: Drone Swarm Controller
products.description: Command center for autonomous drone fleet. Be everywhere at once with your mechanical army.

products.name: Tunnel Mole
products.description: Underground drilling vehicle. Make your own roads when the streets belong to your enemies.

products.name: Orbital Shuttle
products.description: Private spacecraft for off-world travel. When Earth gets too hot, the stars are calling your name.
